page.title: 03Events Around Tenbury 1.
page.content: Kendrick homes is an estate for elderly people. The site has thirty_six houses and bungalows especially for elderly people.It was begun in early 1985 and is sited up Berrington Road. Other houses for elderly people include Cornwall Gardens, St Marys close and Collage house used for a special old peoples homes. Tenbury is more a retirement town where people come to live once they have retired. A new fire station is going to be built for Tenbury services 1985/86.plans are being made for using money from the budget.The new fire station is going to be built next to the Swan Garage (Burford, Shropshire). the old station in Teme street will be sold. Plans are being made for more class
